description: Turmeric, chilli, and cumin help fire up your metabolism
name: Sweet Potato Chilli Bites Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the soaked chickpeas and rinse under cold water. Place in a pan with 500ml boiling water, cover, and simmer for around 1 hour until soft.
Steam the chunks of sweet potato for 15 minutes until soft.
While the sweet potato is steaming, heat the oil in a frying pan and gently fry the onion and garlic until soft. Add the turmeric, cumin, and chilli, and fry for a further 2 minutes.
Put the chickpeas, sweet potato, lemon juice, tahini, and coriander in a food processor and whizz for about 10 seconds to rough it all up just a little you definitely don't want to overblitz it.
Tip the contents into a big bowl and add the onion mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Stir well.
Divide the mixture into 16 evenly sized portions and roll into balls with your hands. Place them on a baking tray lined with parchment paper and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.
Remove and leave to cool on a wire rack for a few minutes to harden up before serving hot. Alternatively, serve cold.
